how_to_move_pawn_desc: Pawn moves forward one square at a time
From starting position, can move two squares forward
When reaching the last rank, promotes to any piece (except king)
how_to_move_rook_desc: Can move any number of squares
Captures enemy pieces by moving to their square
how_to_move_knight_desc: Knight moves in an 'L' shape - two squares forward and one to the side
Can only move to squares of the opposite color
Captures enemy pieces, moving to their place
how_to_move_bishop_desc: Can move any number of squares
Captures enemy pieces by moving to their square
how_to_move_queen_desc: Queen moves horizontally, vertically, and diagonally
Can move any number of squares
Captures enemy pieces by moving to their square
how_to_move_king_desc: King moves one square in any direction
Cannot move to a square that puts it in check
Cannot move to a square that is already occupied by a friendly piece
Cannot move to a square that is already occupied by an enemy piece
learn_how_to_play_with_pieces: Learn how to play with pieces:
puzzles_mate_in_one_1_desc: White to move and checkmate in one.
puzzles_mate_in_one_1_hint: Look for a back rank mate.
puzzles_mate_in_one_2_desc: White to move and checkmate in one.
puzzles_mate_in_one_2_hint: Use the queen to deliver mate on the edge.
puzzles_mate_in_two_1_desc: White to move and checkmate in two.
puzzles_mate_in_two_1_hint: Start with a check and use all your pieces.
puzzles_basic_tactics_1_desc: White to move and win material.
puzzles_basic_tactics_1_hint: Look for a fork with the knight.
